PyDataSource.AddOn.parameter¶

AddOn.parameter(**kwargs)[source]¶

Add parameters as keword arguments. Will be perserved if module is added or DataSource is reloaded and is saved along with other AddOn information with save_config.

Examples

>>> evt.acqiris.add.parameter(foo='bar', backlevel=1.)

or alternatively

>>> params = {foo='bar', backlevel=1.}
>>> evt.acqiris.add.parameter(**params)
